root.name: Channel Montage
root.description: View your multi-channel data as a montage with one image per channel plus a merged, color channel (useful to create figures for communication)
root.author: adufour - Alexandre Dufour
root.changelog:

- Version 2.4.5.0 Date 2015-07-30 18:04:47
